plot: A father and a girl plays hide-and seek in an environment, where you can't hide anywhere, but in your imagination. Who will win?
title: Aki bújt, bújt
plot_es: A father and a girl plays hide-and seek in an environment, where you can't hide anywhere, but in your imagination. Who will win?
plot_en: A father and a girl plays hide-and seek in an environment, where you can't hide anywhere, but in your imagination. Who will win?
